Reviews.Title: “Thanks!!”

Reviews.Content: arrived amsterdam cold evening modern hotel elevator 5 minutes central station bit expensive instead chose clemens hotel near anne frank house station bus dont walk breakfast included tasty stairs common amsterdam night stayed daughter forgot glasses following morning taking train look lady charge cleaning advice send email days wrote found glasses address send surprise relatives received little box amsterdam travelling europe feel grateful service answering emails caring paying posting box recomend hotel friends feel comfortable neighbourhood ahh forgot nice balcony breakfast couldnt enjoy cold time imagine nice summer times soon thanks

Reviews.Content: friends previous review stayed clemens april 4th 2012 moment arrived hotel exceeded expectations previous reviews stated stairs leading reception breakfast remarkably steep friends massively heavy chap reception lugged grumble offered complementary drink checked stayed spotlessly clean single perfect cleaned day slightly worn lick paint fresh furnishings budget pay breakfast provided hotel included rate plentiful varied share shower toilet floor free probably biggest asset hotel location 5 minutes walk anne frank museum dam square 15 minutes central station 5 minutes jordaan 40 minutes stroll canal museumplein evening people travelling medical ears story short concerned flying damaging hearing search night pharmacy luck returned hotel reception locate chap im sorry name beyond contacted doctor friend ear drops spray help ease blockage ears bearing mind 10pm tuesday night provided items free charge remarkable service deserves attention drawn incredibly grateful help caring attitude exceptional luxury isnt central hub sightseeing amsterdam charm service pitched perfectly help peace dont stay thanks

Reviews.Title: “Watch out for bed bug in Hotel Clemens Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Flying-Grasshopper
Reviews.Content: bed bugs alerts stayed 5 nights ensuite triple hotel clemens 2 kids school half term oct 2010 bite marks night kids itchy itchy time amsterdam red spots arms legs allergy reaction skin due detergents sheets returned home london 3 started bite mark appearing day days counted 200 bites neck arms legs fortunately kids badly biten doctor embarassing wash clothes steamed suitcases buy bed bugs killer products spray house insects hid clothes bites appearing 6 days returned home terrible experience

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother - unless you like to pay expensive prices for budget hotel!”
Reviews.Author: LENNi379
Reviews.Content: saturday hotel didnt look bad desperate found decent booked informed 150 euro saturday 120 euro sunday pay cash didnt credit cards left retrieve bags cash atm leaving deposit 20 euro returned key left own devices guy reception wasnt rude didnt feel welcome getting floors amsterdam found reasonably clean ground grime definitely flick duster marginally ive stayed moved beds slightly closer found tissues toilet roll unused bedthe glass window cracked window didnt shut properly teacoffee facilities reception tea coffee machine situated shut returned town tv didnt wasnt visitors reception closed returned report couldnt breakfast served 730 10 am missed saturday setting alarm leave breakfast sunday morning handed keys deposit returned absolutely attempt communication receptionist pleasantries nice time safe trip home offered poor effort opinion plus hotel apart chiming bells pretty able sleep close dam square beds ok except sheets ill fitting poorly dont pay own bed bowl sweets reception werent shy helping ourselves paid â£300 stay frills nights sweets attempt frill stay unless dropped prices drastically budget hotel ridiculously prices yes location convenient price charged definitely dont value money

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel easter weekend 2010 overall nice stay central location 5 minutes walk dam square anne franks house top floor stairs steep care especially coming suitcase basic comfy bed tv nice balcony view onto street trams bit noisy shared shower cupboard corridor toilet incredibly consider slim person closed door knees staff friendly breakfast served dining basic

Reviews.Content: amazing service friendly staff cant believe classed 2 star awful experience booking hotel red light district inadvertantly moved clean decorated lots light tv free wireless phone service brilliant bad experience insisted ensuite didnt single triple single rate 75 euros worth penny breakfast continental lots variety bad low carb diets reception information clue amsterdam definitely recommend hotel xx
